ygData.subject: RE: The latest patch
ygData.msgSnippet: That was fixed today and put back to 100% weight reduction. Enough people bitched that they finally saw the error of his ways. Astur il Ayan, Cleric of Brell
ygData.messageBody:
That was fixed today and put back to 100% weight reduction. Enough people
bitched that they finally saw the error of his ways.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> One major thing that affects us that the box of abu kar is no longer
> weightless - only 10% weight reduction! Damn it!
>
